get.description: This endpoint retrieves detailed information about a user's association with various products within an institution. The response provides a comprehensive view of the user's roles, product statuses and the relevant timestamps.

parameters.name: roles
parameters.description: General role of the user related to the product.

parameters.name: states
parameters.description:
The current status of the user on the product.
Available values: ACTIVE, PENDING, TOBEVALIDATED, SUSPENDED, DELETED, REJECTED

parameters.name: productRoles
parameters.description:
The current status of the user on the product.
Available values: ACTIVE, PENDING, TOBEVALIDATED, SUSPENDED, DELETED, REJECTED

post.description: Service to retrieve user info including institutions and products linked to him, this service retrives 100 institutions at most
The service allows the onboarding of Users to a subunit of an Institution

post.summary: The service adds users to the registry if they are not present and associates them with the institution and product contained in the body
post.description: The service adds users to the registry if they are not present and associates them with the institution and product contained in the body
The service allows the onboarding of an institution through import
The service allows the onboarding of an institution through import with aggregates
Verify if given taxId is legal of given institution identified with vatNumber
Checks if there is an institution with given externalId and returns its internalId if doesn't exists it creates it

get.description: Service to retrieve user's onboarded product info
The service retrieves all the onboarded institutions related to the logged user
Service to get all the active users related to a specific pair of institution-product

parameters.name: productRoles
parameters.description: Specific role of the user related to the product.

get.description: Service to retrieve all active products for given institution and logged user
Service to retrieve a contract given institutionId and productId

get.summary: Service to retrieve tokens from product's identifier
get.description: Service to retrieve tokens from product's identifier

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Token's status. Available values: REQUEST, TOBEVALIDATED, PENDING, COMPLETED, FAILED, REJECTED, DELETED

OnboardedInstitutionResource.title: OnboardedInstitutionResource

userEmail.description: User's email linked to the institution

OnboardedInstitutionResource.description: Object that includes all info about onboarded institutions linked to a user

onboardedInstitutions.description: Object that includes all info about onboarded institutions linked to a user

UserResource.title: UserResource

lastActiveOnboardingUserEmail.description: User's last active onboarding used email

UserResource.description: Object that includes all info about a user

recipientCode.description: Billing recipient code, not required only for institutionType SA

isAggregator.description: True if institution is an aggregator

contractType.description: PSP Contract type A or B

Problem.title: Problem

type.description: A URL to a page with more details regarding the problem.

title.description: Short human-readable summary of the problem.

detail.description: Human-readable description of this specific problem.

instance.description: A URI that describes where the problem occurred.

invalidParams.description: A list of invalid parameters details.

Problem.description: A "problem detail" as a way to carry machine-readable details of errors (https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7807)

institutionId.description: The institution ID where users will be added. This takes precedence over the tax code

institutionTaxCode.description: Add users to the institution via tax code. Can be used in combination with institutionSubunitCode

institutionSubunitCode.description: Add users to the institution via subunit code. Can be used in combination with institutionTaxCode

sendCreateUserNotificationEmail.description: Send an email notification to the user. By default it's set to true

toAddOnAggregates.description: Enable automatic management of group assignment

id.description: User ID of a user already in the registry. A role will be added to the institution/product for the user. It takes precedence over taxCode

taxCode.description: The tax code of the user to add / create. If id is present, the field is ignored

name.description: The name of the user to add / create. If id is present, the field is ignored

surname.description: The surname of the user to add / create. If id is present, the field is ignored

email.description: The email address of the user to add / create. If id is present, the field is ignored

userMailUuid.description: The email ID of the user already in the registry to be assigned to the institution/product. This field is only used when adding a user by ID

role.description: The role to assign to the user

productRole.description: The product role to assign to the user based on the product specifications

env.description: Environment. The field is currently not used to create users. It's only returned in response

roleLabel.description: The product role label based on the product specifications. The field is currently not used to create users

activatedAt.description: Previous contract sign date for import

onboardingDate.description: Institution's old onboarding date in the format 2007-12-03T10:15:30+01:00 (YYYY-MM-DD-T-HH:mm:ss+UTC)

id.description: A unique identifier for the user-institution association record.

institutionRootName.description: The root name of the institution

products.description: Object that includes all info about onboarded institutions linked to a user

UserProductResource.title: UserProductResource

tokenId.description: A unique identifier for the token associated with the product.

status.description:
The current status of the user on the product.
Available values: ACTIVE, PENDING, TOBEVALIDATED, SUSPENDED, DELETED, REJECTED

productRole.description: The specific role of the user related to the product.

productRoleLabel.description: The specific role label of the user related to the product.

role.description: Available values: MANAGER, DELEGATE, SUB_DELEGATE, OPERATOR, ADMIN_EA

UserProductResource.description: Object that includes all info about onboarded institutions linked to a user

OnboardedProductResource.title: OnboardedProductResource
OnboardedProductResource.description: Object that includes user's onboarded product info

recipientCode.description: Billing recipient code, not required only for institutionType SA

urlPublic.description: URL that redirects to the public information webpage of the product

urlBO.description: URL that redirects to the back-office section, where is possible to manage the product

parentId.description: Root parent of the sub product

roleMappings.description: Mappings between Party's and Product's role

ProductRoleInfo.title: ProductRoleInfo
ProductRoleInfo.description: Mappings between Party's and Product's role

bearerAuth.description: A bearer token in the format of a JWS and conformed to the specifications included in [RFC8725](https://tools.ietf.org/html/RFC8725)
